alert.note: Alert for Arches, Grand Flat; Eastern Uinta Basin; Tavaputs Plateau (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 18 at 2:14AM MDT until April 18 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts exceeding 55 mph expected in exposed locations. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Colorado and east central and northeast Utah. * WHEN...From 9 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. People, especially those with respiratory illnesses, heart disease, the elderly, and children are recommended to stay indoors and avoid prolonged outdoor exercise or heavy exertion due to wind-blown dust.

area.areaDesc: Arches, Grand Flat; Eastern Uinta Basin; Tavaputs Plateau
